summary: The Innis Residence Council (IRC) is hiring committee co-chairs for the GAME and Environmental committees. This opportunity allows residents to gain leadership experience while contributing to the community. The application deadline is July 25th at 11:59 PM, with interviews conducted on a rolling basis.
title: Hiring Committee Co-Chairs for GAME and Environmental Committees

summary: A graphic design contest for Innis Residence residents to create a logo for the Innis Residence Council for the 2024-2025 academic year. Participants can submit their designs via email or a form by June 19th for a chance to win a $15 gift card.
title: Innis Residence Council Logo Design Contest

summary: The Innis Residence Council (IRC) is hiring House Representatives for the upcoming school year. This is an opportunity for residents to gain leadership experience. Interested applicants can apply by scanning the QR code or visiting the IRC website. The application deadline is June 4th at 11:59 PM, with interviews conducted on a rolling basis.
title: Hiring House Representatives at Innis Residence

summary: The Innis Residents' Council (IRC) is hiring for positions that involve community engagement and event management. Interested residents can apply through the provided QR codes or the IRC website. There will be additional opportunities to apply in July and September.
title: Innis Residents' Council Hiring Announcement

summary: The IRC Semi-Formal was a successful event held on March 16, 2024, where attendees enjoyed a great time together.
title: IRC Semi-Formal Celebration

summary: The meeting times have been rescheduled to Friday afternoons.
title: Rescheduled Meeting Announcement

summary: Weekly meeting for the group at University College, aiming to establish a regular schedule for the semester.
title: Weekly Group Meeting

summary: The first meeting of the semester will take place on January 17, welcoming both returning and new members.

summary: Final meeting of the semester held in room 53 from 2 PM to 4 PM.

summary: This is the penultimate meeting of the group, taking place in UC257. Everyone is encouraged to attend.
title: Penultimate Meeting Announcement

summary: The post announces the newly elected executive team for the IRHRSA for the years 2024-2025.
title: Announcement of IRHRSA 2024-2025 Executive Team
